answerText: Vladimir Nabokov[10] Nabokov also wrote Pale Fire, which mostly consists of commentary on a 999-line poem by this fictional author.
heading: DRAGOON |2013 | Extra Tiebreakers | 4 | Literature | American | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: This author wrote about a Russian professor at an American university who gets on the wrong train to deliver a lecture. For 10 points each: [10] Name this Russian-born American author of Pnin who wrote about Humbert Humbert's attraction to Dolores Haze in Lolita.
